name: HMI Functional Design Specification
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(HMI Functional Design Specification:<* Eval([IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Implementation Methodology)*>,)){((28*0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_sz)*> + 4*0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_sf_temp)*>)+(24 + 16*0<*VALUE(Number of Display Prototypes)*>))}{((16*0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_sz)*> + 4*0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_sf_temp)*>)+(16 + 12*0<*VALUE(Number of Display Prototypes)*>))}[ENDIF]) *>)*>
description:
If im= Non-Standard Build
Calculated Hrs = (( 28 * SZ + 4 * SF ) + (24 + 16 * dp)) * 0.9
Else
Calculated Hrs = (( 16 * SZ + 4 * SF ) + (16 + 16 * dp)) * 0.9
